001package game;
002
003/**
004 * This class creates all items used in the world of Zuul
005 * @author TARATIBU Christophe
006 */
007public class Item {
008    private String aItemDescription;
009    private int aItemWeight;
010
011    /**
012     * Constructor for objects of class Item
013     * @param pItemDescription Description of the item
014     * @param pItemPoids Weight of the item             
015     */
016    public Item(final String pItemDescription, final int pItemPoids){
017        this.aItemDescription = pItemDescription;
018        this.aItemWeight = pItemPoids;
019       
020    }
021    
022    /**
023     * Get the item weight
024     * @return Weight of the item
025     */
026    public int getItemPoids(){
027        return this.aItemWeight;
028    }
029
030    /**
031     * Get the item name
032     * @return Name of the item
033     */
034    public String getItemName(){
035        return this.aItemDescription;
036    }
037    /**
038     * Get the item description
039     * @return Description of the item
040     */
041    public String getItemDescription(){
042        return "There is " + this.aItemDescription + "Item weight : " + this.aItemWeight;
043    }
044}
